entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy near midnight then light snow. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this evening except gusting to 50 at times. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Light snow. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 50 at times. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
